metadata.name: Compress Data and Lock With Password for Exfiltration With 7-ZIP
metadata.comment: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(device.desc), lower('7-zip')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\7z.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\7zr.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\7za.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('7z\\.exe', '7za\\.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' u '))))

output.summary: An adversary may compress or encrypt data that is collected prior to exfiltration using 3rd party utilities

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate activity is expected since compressing files with a password is common. Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1560.001/T1560.001.md
